title: Database Service
description: This schema defines the Database Service entity, such as MySQL, BigQuery, Redshift, Postgres, or Snowflake. Alternative terms such as Database Cluster, Database Server instance are also used for database service.

databaseServiceType.description: Type of database service such as MySQL, BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, Postgres...

id.description: Unique identifier of this database service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this database service.

serviceType.description: Type of database service such as MySQL, BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, Postgres...

description.description: Description of a database service instance.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this database service.

ingestionSchedule.description: Schedule for running metadata ingestion jobs.
